column4: Oh, awhle ago I was talking about pidgin and kopete and the "now playing" features...I discovered that the kopete i have is kopete-kde4...the now playing plugin is not working with pidgin on ubuntu...BUT the kopete-kde3 is working fine...pidgin, has so many "now playing" plugins available on the net but none of them worked...

ï»¿Oh, awhle ago I was talking about pidgin and kopete and the "now playing" features...I discovered that the kopete i have is kopete-kde4...the now playing plugin is not working with kopete-kde4 on ubuntu...BUT the kopete-kde3 is working fine...pidgin, has so many "now playing" plugins available on the net but none of them worked...
and kopete seems slow inside ubuntu...so still I'm here at pidgin...
you may wish to ask in #kubuntu-kde4 about that first one
